description:
AlmaLinux OS, an open-source and free enterprise Linux operating system, is developing a preview version of AlmaLinux OS 10, codenamed “Kitten”.

The post AlmaLinux OS Kitten 10: A Sneak Peek into the Future of AlmaLinux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: AlmaLinux OS Kitten 10: A Sneak Peek into the Future of AlmaLinux

description:
To provide an insight into the quality of software that is available, we have compiled a list of the best Nix static site generators. All of these tools are released under a freely distributable license.

The post 3 Best Free and Open Source Nix Static Site Generators appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 3 Best Free and Open Source Nix Static Site Generators
